description:
Transform the application into a PWA with offline support, installability, and push notifications. Use service workers with Effect-based cache strategies. Optimize the existing Vite build pipeline for mobile performance with lazy loading and code splitting.

**Rationale:** Users increasingly access applications on mobile devices and expect app-like experiences. PWA capabilities enable offline work during connectivity issues and reduce friction with native-like installation, improving engagement.
